verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> Yah,<WH3050> for it is good<WH2896> to sing praises<WH2167> to our God;<WH430> for it is pleasant<WH5273> and fitting<WH5000> to praise him.<WH8416>
Yahweh<WH3068> builds up<WH1129> Jerusalem.<WH3389> He gathers together<WH3664> the outcasts<WH1760> of Israel.<WH3478>
He heals<WH7495> the broken<WH7665> in heart,<WH3820> and binds up<WH2280> their wounds.<WH6094>
He counts<WH4487> the number<WH4557> of the stars.<WH3556> He calls<WH7121> them all by their names.<WH8034>
Great<WH1419> is our Lord,<WH113> and mighty<WH7227> in power.<WH3581> His understanding<WH8394> is infinite.<WH4557>
Yahweh<WH3068> upholds<WH5749> the humble.<WH6035> He brings<WH8213> the wicked<WH7563> down<WH8213> to the ground.<WH776>
Sing<WH6030> to Yahweh<WH3068> with thanksgiving.<WH8426> Sing praises<WH2167> on the harp<WH3658> to our God,<WH430>
who covers<WH3680> the sky<WH8064> with clouds,<WH5645> who prepares<WH3559> rain<WH4306> for the earth,<WH776> who makes grass<WH2682> grow<WH6779> on the mountains.<WH2022>
He provides<WH5414> food<WH3899> for the livestock,<WH929> and for the young<WH1121> ravens<WH6158> when they call.<WH7121>
He doesn't<WH2654> delight in the strength<WH1369> of the horse.<WH5483> He takes no pleasure<WH7521> in the legs<WH7785> of a man.<WH376>
Yahweh<WH3068> takes pleasure<WH7521> in those who fear<WH3373> him,<WH3176> in those who hope in his loving kindness.<WH2617>
Praise<WH7623> Yahweh,<WH3068> Jerusalem!<WH3389> Praise<WH1984> your God,<WH430> Zion!<WH6726>
For he has strengthened<WH2388> the bars<WH1280> of your gates.<WH8179> He has blessed<WH1288> your sons<WH1121> inside you.<WH7130>
He makes<WH7760> peace<WH7965> in your borders.<WH1366> He fills<WH7646> you with the finest<WH2459> of the wheat.<WH2406>
He sends out<WH7971> his commandment<WH565> to the earth.<WH776> His word<WH1697> runs<WH7323> very swiftly.<WH4120>
He gives<WH5414> snow<WH7950> like wool,<WH6785> and scatters<WH6340> frost<WH3713> like ashes.<WH665>
He hurls down<WH7993> his hail<WH7140> like pebbles.<WH6595> Who can stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> his cold?<WH7135>
He sends out<WH7971> his word,<WH1697> and melts<WH4529> them.<WH7307> He causes his wind to blow,<WH5380> and the waters<WH4325> flow.<WH5140>
He shows<WH5046> his word<WH1697> to Jacob;<WH3290> his statutes<WH2706> and his ordinances<WH4941> to Israel.<WH3478>
He has not done<WH6213> this for just any nation.<WH1471> They don't<WH3045> know his ordinances.<WH4941> Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050>
